entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
